summary: Researched bilateral semantics notation conventions from IdentityAboutness.tex. Found that bilateral semantics requires FOUR distinct constants (not two): \top/\bot for ground ordering, \Top/\Bot for parthood ordering, where \Top := \neg\bot (verum) and \Bot := \neg\top (falsum). Identified 4 files requiring updates.

artifacts.summary: Research report with notation conventions, four-element structure analysis, and implementation recommendations for logos-notation.sty and context documentation

next_steps: Run /plan 823 to create implementation plan for adding \Top, \Bot, \ver, \fal macros to logos-notation.sty and updating context documentation
